api_list.name: View status code and message
api_list.description: View status code and message for the specified value.

api_list.name: View a personalized greeting
api_list.description: View a personalized greeting for the specified or guest user.

api_list.name: View API affirmation
api_list.description: View API affirmation in HTML format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pe-demo.p.rapidapi.com/iloveapis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pe-demo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
